class="mobileNav_label__fFKWC">Integrations</span><span class="mobileNav_badge__GZ6I4"></span></div></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div><div class="mobileNav_section__8z2id mobileNav_hasMenu__fcGEu" class="SuperDuperContentSection_contentSection__G9DSF"><div class="analytics-scroll-point" id="SuperDuperContentSection-Writing" style="display:inline"></div><article class="SuperDuperContentSection_content__8HnD8"><h3 class="typography_typography__Exx2D heading_heading__OmVf6" style="--typography-font:var(--typography-sans-700-bold-font-weight) var(--typography-sans-700-bold-font-weight-variable);--typography-font-variation-settings-sm:&quot;wght&quot; var(--typography-sans-900-bold-font-weight-variable);--typography-letter-spacing:var(--typography-sans-700-bold-letter-spacing);--typography-letter-spacing-sm:var(--typography-sans-900-bold-letter-spacing);--typography-color:inherit">Build perfect docs, together.</h3><p class="typography_typography__Exx2D" style="--typography-font:var(--typography-sans-300-medium-font-weight) var(--typography-sans-300-medium-font-size) / var(--typography-sans-300-medium-line-height) var(--typography-sans-300-medium-font-family);--typography-font-sm:var(--typography-sans-300-medium-font-weight) var(--typography-sans-300-medium-font-size) / var(--typography-sans-300-medium-line-height) var(--typography-sans-300-medium-font-family);--typography-font-variation-settings:&quot;wght&quot; var(--typography-sans-300-medium-font-weight-variable);--typography-font-variation-settings-sm:&quot;wght&quot; var(--typography-sans-300-medium-font-weight-variable);--typography-letter-spacing:var(--typography-sans-300-medium-letter-spacing);--typography-letter-spacing-sm:var(--typography-sans-300-medium-letter-spacing);--typography-color:var(--color-gray-500)">Capture your ideas, get feedback from teammates, and ask AI to add the finishing touches.</p><a class="InlineTextLink_inlineLink__oN8YM InlineTextLink_colorTheme__waxe8 InlineTextLink_underlineOnHover__J78xW" target="_self" href="/product/docs"><span class="InlineTextLink_linkContent__SYI4r"><span class="typography_typography__Exx2D" style="--typography-font:var(--typography-sans-300-medium-font-weight) var(--typography-sans-300-medium-font-weight-variable);--typography-letter-spacing:var(--typography-sans-300-medium-letter-spacing);--typography-letter-spacing-sm:var(--typography-sans-300-medium-letter-spacing);--typography-color:var(--color-blue-500)">Explore docs &amp; notes</span></span><span aria-hidden="true" class="InlineTextLink_arrow__Vz4dB InlineTextLink_arrowAfter__XQoVx">â†’</span></a></article><ul class="SuperDuperContentSection_features__65KvF"><li class="SuperDuperContentSection_featuresItem__DU_V9"><div class="IllustratedIcon_icon__Igdc5" data-icon="buildingBlocks"><video muted="" playsinline=""></video></div><span><h4 class="typography_typography__Exx2D" style="--typography-font:var(--typography-sans-200-bold-font-weight) var(--typography-sans-200-bold-font-size) / var(--typography-sans-200-bold-line-height) var(--typography-sans-200-bold-font-family);--typography-font-sm:var(--typography-sans-200-bold-font-weight) var(--typography-sans-200-bold-font-size) / blocks</h4><p class="typography_typography__Exx2D" style="--typography-font:var(--typography-sans-200-medium-font-weight) var(--typography-sans-200-medium-font-size) / content types to communicate any idea.</p></span></li><li class="SuperDuperContentSection_featuresItem__DU_V9"><div class="IllustratedIcon_icon__Igdc5" data-icon="collaboration"><video muted="" var(--typography-sans-200-medium-font-weight-variable);--typography-font-variation-settings-sm:&quot;wght&quot; var(--typography-sans-200-medium-font-weight-variable);--typography-letter-spacing:var(--typography-sans-200-medium-letter-spacing);--typography-letter-spacing-sm:var(--typography-sans-200-medium-letter-spacing);--typography-color:var(--color-gray-500)">Put tedious tasks on autopilot.</p></span></li></ul><section class="SuperDuperContentSection_screenshot__ba6tK"><div><video muted="" src="/front-static/pages/product/super-duper/plan/plan-screen-mobile.mp4" class="Video_video__KYz0l Video_videoAspectRatio__qVTeE" poster="/_next/image?url=%2Ffront-static%2Fpages%2Fproduct%2Fsuper-duper%2Fplan%2Fplan-screen-mobile-ff.png&amp;w=1920&amp;q=90" style="--video-aspect-ratio:670 / 760" width="670" height="760" preload="none" playsinline=""></video></div></section><div class="SuperDuperContentSection_competitors__xb7nF"><h4 class="typography_typography__Exx2D SuperDuperContentSection_competitorsHeading__1X4Sr" style="--typography-font:var(--typography-sans-200-bold-font-weight) var(--typography-sans-200-bold-font-size) / var(--typography-sans-200-bold-line-height) var(--typography-sans-200-bold-font-family);--typography-font-sm:var(--typography-sans-200-bold-font-weight) var(--typography-sans-200-bold-font-size) / var(--typography-sans-200-bold-line-height) var(--typography-sans-200-bold-font-family);--typography-font-variation-settings:&quot;wght&quot; class="SuperDuperFeatures_features__K0r_N"><div class="analytics-scroll-point" id="SuperDuperFeatures" style="display:inline"></div><header class="SuperDuperFeatures_heading__HWi3y"><h2 class="typography_typography__Exx2D" style="--typography-font:var(--typography-sans-700-bold-font-weight) var(--typography-sans-700-bold-font-size) / var(--typography-sans-700-bold-line-height) started.</h2></header><section class="Block_block__Q3GQF" style="--block-shadow:var(--shadow-undefined)"><div class="BlockBasic_wrapper__aL_z2 BlockBasic_rightCorner__R5SQM BlockBasic_vertical__QRexv"><div class="BlockAsset_blockAsset__yO2RP BlockAsset_alignCorner__j_dS7"><div class="BlockAsset_asset__UONUs BlockAsset_rightCorner__aUv_3"><div><h3 class="typography_typography__Exx2D heading_heading__OmVf6" style="--typography-font:var(--typography-sans-600-semibold-font-weight) var(--typography-sans-600-semibold-font-size) / var(--typography-sans-600-semibold-line-height) var(--typography-sans-600-semibold-font-family);--typography-font-sm:var(--typography-sans-700-semibold-font-weight) Not Sell or Share My Info</span></button><button type="button" class="footer_button__vbjiT"><span class="typography_typography__Exx2D"
